1.name: Role-Specific Training
1.description: Training tailored to specific SE roles (System Engineer, Project Manager, etc.)
1.approach: Focus on competencies required for specific organizational roles

2.name: Competency-Level Based
2.source: Competency scaling system throughout Excel matrices
2.approach: Progressive competency development from basic to mastery level

3.name: Process-Oriented Training
3.description: Training aligned with ISO 15288 SE processes
3.approach: Training organized around SE lifecycle processes and activities

4.name: Project-Oriented Training
4.approach: Practical application in real project contexts

5.name: Generic Qualification Plan
5.description: Standardized training for roles without prior SE knowledge
5.source: gQP - Customer representative sheet showing generic modules
5.approach: Foundation-level training covering all core SE competencies

6.name: Industry-Specific Training
6.description: Training customized for specific industry domains
6.source: Industries template directory and INCOSE competency mappings
